blogPost.excerpt: RapidReg - a scheduling and form building tool that includes all you need in one place, at a price you can't beat! Registrations, Form & survey builders, Availability calendars & online booking, Pricing and payments, and go green with planted trees!
blogPost.body: RapidReg - a scheduling and form building tool that includes all you need in one place, at a price you can't beat! Registrations, Form & survey builders, Availability calendars & online booking, Pricing and payments, and go green with planted trees!
blogPost.title: RapidReg LTD - Forms, bookings & scheduler with no limits that plants trees
blogPost.author: Chris Collins

localize.description: RapidReg - 一个日程安排和表格建立工具，包括所有你需要在一个地方，在一个价格你不能打！注册，表格和调查问卷建立，可用性日历和在线预订，定价和付款。注册，表格和调查建设者，可用性日历和在线预订，定价和付款，并去绿色种植的树木!
localize.tagline: 表格，预订和无限制的日程安排，植树。

localize.description: RapidReg - 一個日程安排和表格建立工具，包括所有你需要在一個地方，在一個價格你不能打！註冊，表格和調查問卷建立，可用性日曆和在線預訂，定價和付款。註冊，表格和調查建設者，可用性日曆和在線預訂，定價和付款，並去綠色種植的樹木!
localize.tagline: 表格，預訂和無限制的日程安排，植樹。

previous.excerpt: Recursive is a puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming. It is the perfect game for people who love hard puzzles. Your goal is to help little robots collect all gems by finding the correct pattern and translating it into a short program.
previous.title: Recursive! - A puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming.

localize.description: 递归是一款关于递归、模式和编程的益智游戏。这是一个完美的游戏，喜欢困难的谜题的人。你的目标是帮助小机器人收集所有的宝石，找到正确的模式，并将其转化为一个简短的程序。
localize.tagline: 一个关于递归、模式和编程的益智游戏。

localize.description: 遞歸是一款關於遞歸、模式和編程的益智遊戲。這是一個完美的遊戲，喜歡困難的謎題的人。你的目標是幫助小機器人收集所有的寶石，找到正確的模式，並將其轉化爲一個簡短的程序。
localize.tagline: 一個關於遞歸、模式和編程的益智遊戲。

next.excerpt: Anonymously vouch for the best engineers among your LinkedIn connections and get $1500 for everyone who gets hired. You get assured $20 for just syncing your LinkedIn. Help your friends get connected to top Y-Combinator founders directly. No recruiters.
next.title: Hiring Club - Recommend engineers to top startups and earn $1500 per hire

localize.description: 匿名为你的LinkedIn关系中最优秀的工程师打保票，每个被录用的人都能得到1500美元。只要同步你的LinkedIn，你就能保证获得20美元。帮助你的朋友直接与Y-Combinator的顶级创始人取得联系。没有招聘人员。
localize.tagline: 向顶级创业公司推荐工程师，每聘一次就能赚1500元。

localize.description: 匿名爲你的LinkedIn關係中最優秀的工程師打保票，每個被錄用的人都能得到1500美元。只要同步你的LinkedIn，你就能保證獲得20美元。幫助你的朋友直接與Y-Combinator的頂級創始人取得聯繫。沒有招聘人員。
localize.tagline: 向頂級創業公司推薦工程師，每聘一次就能賺1500元。
